physical_appearance:\The image shows a legal certificate of membership. It is rectangular in shape. The logo of the Audit Bureau of Circulations (UK) is displayed at the top
 together with the words \\Incorporated October 14th 1931\\. \\Audit Bureau of Circulation Limited (By Guarantee)\\ is stated just below the logo. The certificate states the following
subject_terms_1:\\Certificate of Membership. This is to certify that Tamil Murasu is a member of Audit Bureau of Circulation Ltd. Given under our hands and the common seal of the company of London the twelfth day of February legal documents bureaus (offices) businesses (business enterprises) newspapers
subject_terms_2:one thousand nine hundred and fifty eight\\. At the bottom left hand side of the certificate Legal documents Business enterprises Membership Newspapers
subject_terms_3:there is a red embossed seal together with signatures by members of the council.\
subject_terms_4:certification
